txt_en: To be yourself is all that you can do.
txt_cn: 做自己就是你所能做的一切。

txt_en: The heart has its reasons.
txt_cn: 心有它的理由。

txt_en: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
txt_cn: 让自己快乐的最好方式就是去让别人快乐。

txt_en: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
txt_cn: 做出伟大工作的唯一方式是热爱你所做的事。

txt_en: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
txt_cn: 快乐是最简单的感恩形式。

txt_en: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
txt_cn: 机会不会发生，是你创造了它们。

txt_en: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
txt_cn: 坚持不是一场长跑，而是一次次短跑。

txt_en: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
txt_cn: 简单是终极的智慧。

txt_en: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
txt_cn: 任何一份善意，无论多么微小，都不会被浪费。

txt_en: Wisdom begins in wonder.
txt_cn: 智慧始于好奇。

txt_en: It is not the years in your life but the life in your years.
txt_cn: 不是生命中的岁月，而是岁月中的生命。

txt_en: Every flower must grow through dirt.
txt_cn: 每朵花都必须从泥土中成长。

txt_en: Small deeds can make a big difference.
txt_cn: 小小的善举可以带来巨大的改变。

txt_en: You only fail when you stop trying.
txt_cn: 只有停止尝试时，你才会失败。

txt_en: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
txt_cn: 冲突越难，胜利越大。

txt_en: Stars can't shine without darkness.
txt_cn: 没有黑暗，星星无法闪耀。

txt_en: Mistakes are proof that you are trying.
txt_cn: 犯错是你正在努力的证明。

txt_en: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for extraordinary destiny.
txt_cn: 艰难常常为普通人准备非凡的命运。

txt_en: Hope is the heartbeat of the soul.
txt_cn: 希望是灵魂的心跳。

txt_en: Let your faith be bigger than your fear.
txt_cn: 让你的信念比恐惧更强大。
